todos.title: Humble Intro
todos.body: I am happy to join with you'I say to you today my friend'

todos.title: Big Moment
todos.body: What will go down in history..

todos.title: Persistence
todos.body: We will never be satisfied as long as'

todos.title: Honor
todos.body: We shall not honor or sacrifice our freedom by drinking the bitterness of hatred or violence'we must rise to the majestic heights of meeting physical force with soul force'

todos.title: Hope
todos.body: This is not the end but the beginning'This can and will be changed'With this faith'

todos.title: All Tied Together
todos.body: Their freedom is bound to our freedom'no man can be successful until all men are successful..

todos.title: Right Way
todos.body: Shall not be judged by the color of our skin but the content of our character'We are all sisters and brothers'

todos.title: Repetition
todos.body: Repeat statement multiple times using same first words but changing ending'I have a dream'I have a dream'I have a dream'

todos.title: Motivation
todos.body: Now is the time'It would be fatal'There will continue to be trouble if we do not act now'

todos.title: Dream
todos.body: I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live up the true meaning of its creed'

todos.title: Strong End
todos.body: Free at last, free at last, thank God all mighty we are free at last'.

todos.title: Metaphors
todos.body: Bad check'which has been marked insufficient funds'Bank of opportunity'is not empty'Until justice flows down like waters'
